name: init_vault
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;
v . bump_saved = * ctx . bumps . get ("vault") . ok_or (error ! (Errs :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let mut r = v . base as u32 ;
} r = r . wrapping_mul (9) . wrapping_add (i as u32 + 5) ;

name: payout
body: let vault = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
let wrong_signer_seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"vault_alt" , vault . owner . as_ref () , & [vault . bump_saved] ,] ;
let alt_key = Pubkey :: create_program_address (& [b"vault_alt" , vault . owner . as_ref () , & [vault . bump_saved]] , ctx . program_id ,) . map_err (| _ | error ! (Errs :: SeedCompute)) ? ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& alt_key , & ctx . accounts . recipient . key () , lamports) ;
let accs = & [ctx . accounts . alt_vault . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] ;
let mut remain = lamports as u32 ;

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = owner , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 4 + 1 , seeds = [b"vault" , owner . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: alt_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 署名時シードに依存。型・所有者の検証は行っていない。"]

fields.name: recipient
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 受け取り先は緩く受ける例"] # [account (mut)]
